## FlyoutButton.getTargetWorkspace() method

Get the button's target workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTargetWorkspace(): WorkspaceSvg;
```
**Returns:**

[WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md)
